sentences.sContent: They hope their words and deeds can cause the attention of other, peacockish , egocentric, ego abandon, often react to trifling bagatelle mood too intense, sometimes for no reason gets angry.
sentences.sContent_eng: They hope their words and deeds can cause the attention of other, peacockish , egocentric, ego abandon, often react to trifling bagatelle mood too intense, sometimes for no reason gets angry.
sentences.sCn: 他们希望自己的言行能引起他人的关注，虚荣心强，自我中心，自我放纵，常对区区小事情绪反应过于强烈，有时无端发脾气。

synos.tran: [心理]自我中心的；利己主义的

remMethod.val: ego(我) + centr(中心) + ic → 以自我为中心的 → 利己的

trans.tranOther: thinking only about yourself and not about what other people might need or want
